pricing.heading: Unleash the power of <automation>automation</automation>
pricing.description: We offer straightforward pricing plans for teams of all sizes.

starter-subscription.title: Starter
starter-subscription.features:
• Up to 3 users
  • Up to 1 hour runtime per day
  • Up to 10 Workflows
  • 10 GB storage

professional-subscription.title: Professional
professional-subscription.description: Bring automation to the next level
professional-subscription.features:
• 10+ users
  • Up to 6 hours runtime per day
  • Unlimited Workflows
  • 100 GB storage
  • API access
  • Premium customer support

enterprise-subscription.title: Enterprise
enterprise-subscription.features:
• Unlimited users
  • Unlimited runtime
  • Unlimited Workflows
  • 1 TB storage
  • API access
  • Dedicated customer support
  • Custom domain

ultimate-subscription.title: Ultimate
ultimate-subscription.features:
• Unlimited access
  • Access to all features
  • Negotiated terms
  • Custom plans
  • Dedicated account manager
  • Migration assistance

footer.description: Acme Corp is the world's most (in)famous supplier of wildly imaginative products for every possible need.
